amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-428 to require a report from the Environmental Protection Agency and the Army Corps of Engineers on the staffing needs for processing and issuing permits under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act and the impact additional funding for full-time employees would have on processing timelines for permits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
